events.message: I recently purchased a jacket but would like to request a refund because it doesn't fit as expected and I want to return it.
The issue has been identified as a refund request related to a return for a purchased jacket that does not fit.
Assigning the case to a customer service representative specialized in refund processing.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your refund request. I'm here to help you with the process.
Could you please provide your order number and let us know if the jacket has been worn or washed?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The jacket is new, unworn, and still has all the tags attached.
Thank you for the details. We will send you a prepaid return label. Once we receive the jacket, we will process your refund immediately.
That sounds great, thank you for making the return process so easy and straightforward.
The return label has been emailed to you. Please send the jacket back at your earliest convenience, and the refund will be completed promptly.
Just checking in to see if you have returned the jacket so we can finalize your refund. Please contact us if you need any assistance.
Your refund has been successfully processed and your case is now closed. Thank you for shopping with us, and we hope to serve you again.
